items.title: Kick wired CarPlay to the curb with this affordable wireless adapter that’s only $25 for Prime Day
items.summary:
MoKo Wireless CarPlay Adapter

Buy for $25 (Reg. $37)

Clip the on-page $10 off coupon. Prime-exclusive discount.

What we love

When I bought my car back in 2021, it had wired CarPlay. A year or two later, the manufacturer rolled out an update that gave me wireless CarPlay for free. It’s been wonderful to not have to fiddle with cables each time I get in the car. If you have wired CarPlay, this dongle can help you upgrade to a wireless setup for just $25.

While we aren’t necessarily expecting any price drops on the all-new next-generation Echo speakers and displays, Ring and Blink smart cams, or the new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft, there are plenty of big-time discounts now live across the rest of the Echo smart speakers, Fire Tablets, Fire TV Sticks, Kindles, and more. Scope it all out down below.

items.title: Save up to 42% on Dyson vacuums, purifying heater/fans, and styling devices starting from $300
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Prime Big Deal Days, Amazon is offering up to 42% discounts on a collection of vacuums, purifying heater/fans, and styling devices. A popular favorite amongst the bunch is the Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum that has dropped down to $299.99 shipped during this sale. Normally going for $470 at full price, discounts over the year have mostly kept the price down at $350, with one fall to $330 in March and one previous drop lower to this same rate back during July’s similar sales event. That rate is coming back around for the second time in 2025, giving you $170 off the MSRP and dropping things back to the best price we’ve tracked this year. Head below to browse through the other deals from this brand.
